subject: Steroids
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Elected to Baseball Hall of Fame on Tuesday, Tony Gwynn said Wednesday that “we all knew” of players who used steroids but “we didn’t say anything about it.” Cal Ripken was more restrained with his comments.
snippet: Elected to Baseball Hall of Fame on Tuesday, Tony Gwynn said Wednesday that “we all knew” of players who used steroids but “we didn’t say anything about it.” Cal Ripken was more restrained with his comments.
